event-driven.name: Event-Driven Momentum
event-driven.notes: Core strategy. Manual news research → position entry. Need to automate news scanning.

safe-yield.name: Safe Yield / High Probability
positions: Norway Most Gold Medals Winter Olympics
safe-yield.notes: 90%+ probability outcomes. Low return per trade but very safe. Need more volume.

mechanical-ranges.name: Mechanical Range Bets (Small Positions)
positions: Norway Most Total Medals Winter Olympics
mechanical-ranges.notes: Small bets on extreme ranges. High probability NO bets. Template for scaling.

gabagool.name: Asymmetric Pair Trading (Gabagool)
gabagool.notes: NOT YET ACTIVE. Need to start logging YES+NO prices on 10-20 markets to find entry points.

rebalancing-arb.name: Rebalancing Arbitrage
rebalancing-arb.notes: Scanned 1000+ markets. No viable arbs at $433 scale. Tail outcomes illiquid. Revisit at $5K+.

crypto-15min.name: 15-Minute Crypto Binary Arb
crypto-15min.notes: BTC/ETH UP/DN binaries resolving every 15 min. Edge: exchange price lag vs Polymarket. Needs: Binance WS feed for signal, fast execution. Taker fees exist (1.56% max at 50%, 0.06% at extremes). Reference: someone turned $313→$414K. dr-manhattan-ts has findCryptoHourlyMarket(). Risk: HFT-dominated, need speed advantage. Research phase: evaluate feasibility at $500 scale.

cross-platform-arb.name: Cross-Platform Arbitrage (Polymarket↔Kalshi)
cross-platform-arb.notes: UPGRADED 2026-02-13: Expand beyond Kalshi to Opinion + Probable (both blockchain-based, both running airdrop points programs). Delta-neutral: buy YES on one platform, NO on another for same event. Typical spreads 1-3%, ~1%/wk claimed. AIRDROP OVERLAY: Opinion + Probable have weekly points epochs — volume generates airdrop tokens on top of arb profit. Probable points credited Mondays 00:00 UTC. AlertPilot ($100/mo) scans Polymarket+Opinion+Probable with Telegram alerts + AI rule-conflict detection. Risk: different resolution rules across platforms. Next steps: (1) Get Opinion + Probable API access, (2) manually scan 5 matched events for spread, (3) if viable, build cross-platform price monitor. CertiK reports 60% artificial volume on some platforms during airdrop periods = lots of competition but also confirms edge exists.

weather-forecast-arb.name: Weather Forecast Arbitrage (NOAA/ECMWF)
weather-forecast-arb.notes: Intel 2026-02-12: Trade weather markets (temperature ranges, precipitation) using free NOAA forecast data as edge. Markets lag forecast updates by minutes. Temperature ranges must sum to 100% but retail misprices them to 105-115%. 24h resolution = extreme capital velocity. Reported results: 73% win rate over 1300+ trades. Step 1: Manual scan of Polymarket weather markets vs Weather.gov. Step 2: If edge confirmed, build NOAA API feed into bot. Step 3: Automate. NOAA API is free, no key needed. ArbAlert.ai also monitors this.

systematic-no.name: Systematic NO Farming
systematic-no.notes: ~70% of prediction markets resolve NO. Crowd systematically overpays for exciting YES outcomes. Strategy: systematically bet NO on overpriced YES markets. Partially overlaps with safe-yield strategy but with systematic market selection. Research: need historical resolution data to validate the 70% claim on Polymarket specifically.

pipeline.notes: v2 mandates at least 1 new strategy entering pipeline every Monday. 3 new strategies added from night research 2026-02-12.
